text: Leopoldo Petilla is a Filipino politician from the province of Leyte in the Philippines. He is currently serves as a Governor of Leyte. He was first elected as Governor of the province in 2013 and was re-elected in 2016 and 2019. ==References== * * * * ==External links== *Province of Leyte Official Website Category:Living people Category:Governors of Leyte (province) Category:PDP–Laban politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Leopoldo Petilla
